enriched.description:
Selects the element whose [accessible role](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/Roles#aria_role_types) and accessible [name](https://russmaxdesign.github.io/html-elements-names/) are specified
âš  remember to deselect the element with [I reset context](#i-reset-context) if you're no longer acting on it

Checks that an Html element exists with the specified [accessible role](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/Roles#aria_role_types) and [name](https://russmaxdesign.github.io/html-elements-names/)

Checks that an Html element does not exists with the specified [accessible role](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/Roles#aria_role_types) and [name](https://russmaxdesign.github.io/html-elements-names/)

Checks that an Html element exists with the specified [accessible role](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/Roles#aria_role_types), [name](https://russmaxdesign.github.io/html-elements-names/) and content
enriched.wording: I should see $indefiniteArticle $roleName named {string} and containing {string}

enriched.description: Checks that an Html element exists with the specified [accessible role](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/Roles#aria_role_types), [name](https://russmaxdesign.github.io/html-elements-names/) and content, and with the disabled attribute set to true
enriched.wording: I should see $indefiniteArticle $roleName named {string} and containing {string} disabled

enriched.description: Checks that an Html element exists with the specified [accessible role](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/Roles#aria_role_types), [name](https://russmaxdesign.github.io/html-elements-names/) and content, and with the disabled attribute set to false
enriched.wording: I should see $indefiniteArticle $roleName named {string} and containing {string} enabled

enriched.description: Writes the sentence given as a parameter inside the specified field (useful for example to fill in a form field)
enriched.wording: I type the sentence {string} in $definiteArticle $roleName named {string}
